caption:
“I think beauty is truth, understanding and the willingness to learn. When this exists in the artist, we can feel it in the work.” – Jiahe Zhang

Part 3 of our Dissonant Beauty artist interview series explores the practices of Jiahe Zhang and Lyson Marchessault. Their works, shaped by memory, material and myth, offer nuanced reflections on beauty, process and presence.

Read the full interview via the link in bio.

The Dissonant Beauty exhibition is on view at the Rejina Pyo store until April 30. Visit it while you can at 37 Upper James Street, London W1F 9DJ.

#DissonantBeauty
